action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cultist makes three attacks, using Elemental Flail or Elemental Claw in any combination.

action.name: Elemental Flail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

action.name: Elemental Claw
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 120 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) damage of a type chosen by the cultist: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

reaction.name: Elemental Absorption (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The cultist takes Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage. {@actResponse} The cultist gives itself {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to that instance of damage and gains 10 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
